Articles.Content:
Hello!

I am pretty new to this game. I grabbed Simple Rockets on my Android phone a while back as a Free App of the Day on Amazon, and always saw the "Try Kerbal Space Program" option in the menu. I finally grabbed it, and I am amazed at how awesome this game is (even in it's pre launch state!). So far I've had successful (albeit HIGHLY inefficient) trips to Mun and Minnus, as well as somehow accidentally stranding a Kerbal in orbit around the sun. I recently have tried my hand at space station building for fun, and FINALLY had my first successful docking.

I am thinking of branching out and trying some mods or maybe some sort of noob-friendly challenges to try. Do you folks have any suggestions for either? Also, a friend of mine is grabbing the game soon to play (I think it runs on Mac, right) and wanted to try a multiplayer mod. I've looked at Kerbal Multiplayer, and it looks pretty cool, but I haven't been able to access the threads for any of the other threads linked by the wiki.

It is nice to join in this community, and it looks really fun! Thanks Squad for an awesome experience, and I hope to see you all out there on the forums!
Hello Sucitraf. That's all I have to say, "hello," because I don't use mods. But I'm sure someone will come along shortly with some suggestions.
